Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.7 Pañhāvāra
9.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
104.
1052Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe aṭṭha, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1053Paccanīyānulomaṃ.
1054Dassanenapahātabbattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
